amp-next-page separator

sections.doc_:
## Introduction

[`amp-next-page`](/documentation/components/amp-next-page) allows you to add an infinite scroll style experience to your AMP pages.

Note: For performance reasons `amp-next-page` will currently load and display a maximum of three pages on screen at once, so cannot be used to provide a true infinite scroll.
sections.cachedMarkedDoc:
Introduction

amp-next-page allows you to add an infinite scroll style experience to your AMP pages.

Note: For performance reasons amp-next-page will currently load and display a maximum of three pages on screen at once, so cannot be used to provide a true infinite scroll.
sections.normalizedDoc_:
## Introduction

[`amp-next-page`](/documentation/components/amp-next-page) allows you to add an infinite scroll style experience to your AMP pages.

 Note: For performance reasons `amp-next-page` will currently load and display a maximum of three pages on screen at once, so cannot be used to provide a true infinite scroll.

sections.doc_: This sample uses the `amp-next-page` component to load other sample pages. It defines a custom separator and uses the `hideSelectors` feature to remove footer and sidebar.
sections.normalizedDoc_: This sample uses the `amp-next-page` component to load other sample pages. It defines a custom separator and uses the `hideSelectors` feature to remove footer and sidebar.

document.head:
<meta charset="utf-8">
  <link rel="canonical" href="http://localhost:8080/documentation/examples/components/amp-next-page/index.html">
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width,minimum-scale=1,initial-scale=1">
  <script async src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0.js"></script>
  <title>amp-next-page</title>
  <script async custom-element="amp-next-page" src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0/amp-next-page-0.1.js"></script>
  <style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-moz-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-ms-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both}@-webkit-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-moz-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-ms-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-o-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}</style><noscript><style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:none;-moz-animation:none;-ms-animation:none;animation:none}</style></noscript>
document.title: amp-next-page
document._description: amp-next-page allows you to add an infinite scroll style experience to your AMP pages.
